task_description:
{'component_name': 'SPA Component', 'description': '**Core Technologies:**
- **Technology Stack:** React.js for building the SPA, JavaScript (ES6+) for scripting, and CSS/Styled Components for styling.
- **Primary Programming Languages and Frameworks:** React.js and JavaScript.
- **Database Technologies:** Not applicable as the SPA directly interacts with external APIs.
- **Runtime Environment:** Node.js for development and build processes.
- **Integration Technologies:** Axios or Fetch API for making HTTP requests to the Product Data API.
- **UI Technologies:** React.js with Styled Components for responsive and dynamic UI.

**Build and Development Tools:**
- **Build System:** Webpack for module bundling and Babel for JavaScript transpilation.
- **Development Tools:** Visual Studio Code as the primary IDE, ESLint for code linting, and Prettier for code formatting.
- **Testing Frameworks:** Jest for unit testing, React Testing Library for component testing, and Cypress for end-to-end testing.
- **Deployment and CI/CD Requirements:** GitHub Actions for CI/CD pipelines, deploying to a CDN for fast content delivery, and Nginx for serving the application.', 'interfaces': '', 'algorithms': '', 'pseudocode': '', 'local_backend_service': [], 'asset_images_b64': {}, 'available_assets': []}

Task1.task_description: Set up the initial React.js project structure and development environment
Task1.details: Project setup and infrastructure implementation completed successfully. Development environment verified and working correctly.

Task1SubTask1.description: Initialize npm project and install core dependencies
Task1SubTask1.details: Successfully created package.json with all necessary dependencies and npm scripts

Task1SubTask2.details: Successfully created webpack.config.js, .babelrc, .eslintrc, and .prettierrc with appropriate configurations

Task1SubTask3.details: Successfully created src directory with components, services, and styles folders. Created entry points (index.js, App.js) and public directory with index.html

Task1SubTask4.details: Development environment successfully verified. Build process and development server are working correctly. Some minor improvements recommended but not blocking.

Task2.task_description: Implement core application architecture and API integration infrastructure
Task2.details: Set up the core application architecture including API integration layer, component structure, and state management. Implement service layer for external API communication using Axios/Fetch.

Task2SubTask1.details: Successfully created API service layer with Axios configuration, interceptors, error handling, and environment configuration

Task2SubTask2.details: Create base component structure with proper separation of concerns. Set up routing configuration if needed

Task2SubTask3.details: Set up Jest and React Testing Library configuration. Create initial test setup and helper functions

Task2SubTask4.description: Implement error boundary and loading states
Task2SubTask4.details: Create error boundary component and loading state management for API interactions
